G

Game - Class in components
The Game class represents the main logic of a card game.
Game(List<Player>) - Constructor for class components.Game
Constructs a new Game with the specified list of players and initializes the game state.
getColor() - Method in class components.Card
Gets the color of the card.
getName() - Method in class components.players.Player
Gets the name of the player.
getNumber() - Method in class components.Card
Gets the number on the card (applicable only for Number cards).
getType() - Method in class components.Card
Gets the type of the card.
GREEN - Enum constant in enum class utils.Color
Represents the color green.
GREEN_BOLD - Static variable in class utils.ConsoleColors
ANSI escape code for bold green text.
